会弹吉他的女生总给人一种清新不世俗的感觉清风佛过琴弦 旋律随风飘荡在空中总是让心不由的沉浸在歌声中，让我们用心去聆听吧

越听越上瘾的华语小情歌
有些瞬间、有些歌、有些事、有些话、有些人……已经成为永远。
干净的嗓音+简单的伴奏，且行且珍惜
没有华丽的音效，没有炫丽的舞台，民谣的美，在于它的纯粹，一付干净的嗓音，加上一把破木吉他，一身舒适的衣服搭配在一起，就已足够
5 yuan monthly flow, audition online and download free
1.In 2G/3G networks using Gionee music online audition / data flow to download songs produced will be free of traffic charges.
2.Monthly 6G cap. Recommend the use of 3G Internet access, experience better, watch more fluid.

"2G/3G Unicom users to open Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack business, the use of Gionee music mobile phone client, data streaming and downloading which are no longer the billing (temporary supports only the user, Chinese mainland overseas users are not supported). Special Instructions 1. To ensure that your experience, please try to avoid switching network type, in addition, in order to avoid the traffic fee deduction, traffic monitoring software, please uninstall on your mobile phone, for example, Wall-E flow monitor, thank you. 2. Wo 3G prepaid 20 yuan card and campus card does not support packet service. 3. Gionee music hearing the packet service monthly 6G cap. 4. In the use process, the operation may lead to data flow very little, cannot enjoy monthly flow service, as follows: Online music sharing, get lyrics and pictures, set the CRBT, update music library online song list, check the singer micro-blog"
"Customer Service QQ: 2298828654 Service QQ Group: 240664609 Business Hours: 7*24 hours"

"1. how to view the Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack is opened successfully? Answer: you can call 10010 and China Unicom customer service staff query 2. Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack can enjoy what services? Answer: the opening of Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack business, under 2G/3G network using Gionee music online audition / data flow to download songs produced will be free of traffic fees, monthly 6G cap. Recommend the use of 3G network access, experience better, watch more fluid. 3. Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack how much money each month? Answer: Gionee music standard charges 5 yuan / month. Subscribers at the end of the month if not unsubscribe, then automatically renew 1 system. China Unicom in the bill of Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack display Gionee music. 4. how to unsubscribe Gionee music Unicom flow pack business? To unsubscribe, this month can enjoy the packet service? Answer: open the Gionee music text 3gtd to 10655158, according to the content of the message to be. As of this month the expenses have been deducted, unsubscribe success, you can continue to enjoy the packet service to the end of the month, the next month no longer charges. This month in order not to repeat the charges. 5. Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack business, the use of Gionee music if still deducted the conventional flow cost, how to deal with? Answer: A. contact Gionee music service (contact see above) B. dual card dual standby mobile phone, please make sure the service is open access number and number are the same. 6. I ordered Gionee music Unicom flow package service, can use at the same time traffic monitoring software of third? A: No, if you have to order Gionee music packet traffic service, at the same time, the use of traffic monitoring software third may lead to failure of packet traffic in your service, please use caution, suggest you uninstall this traffic monitoring software. 7. 3G Unicom prepaid 20 yuan card users can use the Gionee Music Unicom Flow Pack traffic service? Can not, will buckle the package flow, before opening the business that will clearly mentioned, suggest you unsubscribe. 8. foreign (Hong Kong and Taiwan area) Order Gionee music Unicom flow package service? This music Unicom flow pack temporary support only Chinese mainland, overseas customers please carefully, the inconvenience caused to you please understand"

如何恢复到出厂设置版本/前版本？
为什么很多歌曲搜不到？
为什么音乐播放器总会自动停止、不能后台播放？
"1、首页-更多-当前版本-检查新版本 2、金立软件商店（易用汇）-搜索金立音乐 3、金立音乐官方QQ群（240664609）-群共享 4、在用户反馈里-回复升级，工作人员会联系您。"
"1、手机设置-应用-音乐-卸载，即可恢复到出厂设置版本 2、在用户反馈里-回复前版本号，工作人员会联系您"
"1、首页-更多-基础设置-过滤音频文件，进行权限调整 2、首页-全部歌曲/文件夹-右上角的扫描键，点击即可进行扫描。"
某些歌曲可能涉及版权，没有权限播放、下载
"1、歌词不匹配问题——可以在歌曲播放界面-菜单中-使用歌词搜索 2、下载的歌曲无歌词问题——音乐在线播放时若有歌词，下载音乐的同时歌词也会下载下来；若音乐直接下载（没有经过在线播放），无网情况下播放歌曲是没有歌词的，需联网缓冲歌词。"
"1、若在手机系统管家-开启了绿色后台，请将音乐加入白名单中 2、若没有开启绿色后台，请在用户反馈里描述情况，工作人员会联系您。"
歌曲播放界面-菜单键-定时睡眠，可进行相关时间设置。
"1、在线音乐支持分享到微信、朋友圈；本地音乐支持分享到QQ好友 2、在歌曲列表-下拉菜单-分享；歌曲播放界面-图片右下角-分享。"
"1、路径：首页-更多-易听音效 音效调节界面分为两部分：上部的8种场景音效模式+EQ均衡器为安卓适配音效，外放或耳机均可使用,下部的音效增强为dts音效：需要适配设备，并将右上角的dts开关打开"
首页-更多-个性化背景，有6种标准背景模式，并可自定义图库和照相机。
